Features:Durability
Solid Coaster
Sactionals Coaster is a great little addition to the Sactionals set up and the coffee table piece. Very sturdy, holds a beverage or snack bowl. Even though you could probaby have you beverage rest on the flatness of the arm rest/side, this addition makes everything classier. Sadly, I don't think there's anything else I need from LoveSac now. I guess changing the covers is next!
